message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to end this quickly.
I think we can be fair to both of us. This way, you'll get a slightly smaller share, but you'll still end up with more money in the long run. We can avoid further inflation.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm taking a small hit to end this now. 525,000 for me, and we're done.
